name: ScriptUIFont

properties.name: name
properties.description: The complete font name, consisting of the family and style, if specified.

properties.name: style
properties.description: The font style. One of the constants in ScriptUIGraphics.FontStyle.

properties.name: substitute
properties.description: The name of a substitution font, a fallback font to substitute for this font if the requested font family or style is not available.

description: Encapsulates the qualities of a font used to draw text into a control.
longdesc: Create with the newFont() method.Used as a value of font. Passed as an argument to drawString() and measureString().
